channel.title: Help plz!
channel.description:
Hello everyone i am having a problem with something and i don't know what it is. please post if you can help.
i was hosting a source and my ip worked fine and now i cant have anyone on anymore. even if i try to use my own ip from no-ip.com or my computers ip address i cant login. but with 127.0.0.1 i can. can someone tell me how to fix this problem? any help would be appreciated.
Thank You ------------------------ Kyledibiase <(-_-)>

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @fireman7778 fireman7778
item.description:
@fireman7778 wrote:

[quote=“youknowho, post:4, topic:158716”]Okay, for one, dont go mouthing off at him, you didn’t say you did any of that so he was just posting some things he thought might help. If your gonna jump on people that want to help your not gonna get anywhere here.

You could try making a new no-ip, or getting a new source.[/quote]

no offense but getting a new no-ip or a new source really has nothing to do with port forwarding, its probably a problem with his firewall.

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!

item.description:

Okay, for one, dont go mouthing off at him, you didn’t say you did any of that so he was just posting some things he thought might help. If your gonna jump on people that want to help your not gonna get anywhere here.

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @kyledibiase kyledibiase
item.description:
@kyledibiase wrote:

dude i know all of this and ive done all of that! ive tried everything you have said… please post something useful

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @driger driger
item.description:
@driger wrote:

Hm… Make sure:

[ul][li]Try closing and reloading mopar/silabsoft[/li]
[li]Make sure your running your no-ip[/li]
[li]Make sure the server is running corectly[/li]
[li]make sure that you typed your Ip in right[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
